Title: Deutsche ReGas to charter out Trangas Power as LNG tanker before its dispatch as an FSRU
Description: German private terminal operator Deutsche ReGas said that it will charter out the 174,000 m3 Transgas Power as an LNG tanker before its deployment as a floating storage and regasification unit (FSRU) at the port of Mukran on Germany’s Ruegen island this winter.
Author: JS

Title: Next loading at Idku LNG terminal eyed as Israel conflict creates supply security concerns
Description: Egypt’s 7.2 mtpa Idku LNG terminal is scheduled to load a cargo in the coming week and market participants will be eyeing the terminal’s activities closely amid rising domestic energy supply security concerns in Israel and Egypt as the Israel-Hamas war worsens.
Author: CK
